atk-abh03a43:1_0: 1-19. Idāni teyeva mūlayamake desite kusalādidhamme dhātuvasena saṅgaṇhitvā āyatanayamakānantaraṁ
atk-abh03a43:1_1: desitassa dhātuyamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti. Tattha āyatanayamake vuttanayeneva pāḷivavatthānaṁ
atk-abh03a43:1_2: vetidabbaṁ. Idhāpi hi paṇṇattivārādayo tayo mahāvārā, avasesā antaravārā ca saddhiṁ
atk-abh03a43:1_3: kālappabhedādīhi āyatanayamake āgatasadisāyeva. Idhāpi ca yamakapucchāsukhatthaṁ
atk-abh03a43:1_4: paṭipāṭiyā ajjhattikabāhirā rūpadhātuyova vatvā viññāṇadhātuyo vuttā. Dhātūnaṁ pana
atk-abh03a43:1_5: bahuttā idha āyatanayamakato bahutarāni yamakāni, yamakadiguṇā pucchā, pucchādiguṇā
atk-abh03a43:1_6: ca atthā honti. Tattha cakkhudhātumūlakādīsu yamakesu labbhamānānaṁ yamakānaṁ atthavinicchayo
atk-abh03a43:1_7: āyatanayamake vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Taṁsadisāyeva hettha atthagati, teneva ca
